attributes.action: Waive visa requirements for Ukrainian refugees.
attributes.additional_details: Those fleeing the conflict in Ukraine do not have the time or resources for the lengthy beurocratic visa application process to meet their dire and urgent need for security. The UK should welcome these refugees and offer them safety & shelter.
attributes.background: In light of the Russian invasion of Ukraine, immediately suspend visa requirements for Ukrainian nationals fleeing the conflict.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
